sex.Description: Sex of the participant as reported by the participant.

cohort.Description: Cohort that corresponds to one of two prior publications

Levels.1: Cohort at data collection phase 1; Tseng et al., 2019; doi: 10.1176/appi.ajp.2018.18040491
Levels.2: Cohort at data collection phase 2; Linke et al., 2023; doi: 10.1016/j.jaac.2022.11.009
